name: High Pressure Rain Shower Head with 11'' Extension Arm - High Flow Rainfall Showerhead - Luxury Modern Look - Pressure Boosting (Chrome)
short_description: ENJOY A POWERFUL RAIN SHOWER EVEN IN LOW PRESSURE AREAS - 90 silicon nozzles. The combination of high pressure and air-in technology leads to strong flow. it's the ultimate way to bring a piece of spa luxury to your home.
BRASS ADJUSTABLE SHOWER ARM - 11" Shower extension arm. Made from solid and solid brass. Not worry about breaking or leaking. Adjust the angle and height you want to achieve a better rainfall effect.

STYLISH, NICE LOOK - High-quality ABS plastic body polished chrome shower head, more durable and beautiful. The rubber nubbins (spray outlet holes) are made of high-grade soft rubber, that will allow you to easily wipe away calcium and lime build-up. A low maintenance shower head for years to come.
INSTALLS IN MINUTES - No need any tools. Simply screw on and turn on your new waterfall shower. In order to make it easier to install, we have prepared a special wrench and a teflon tape.

WATER SAVING - The kit also includes a 2.5 GPM and california compliant 1.8 GPM flow restrictor, helps reduce water pressure, no more wasting hot water while getting soaped up. So you can save on your water heater bill or enjoy longer hot showers.

BRAND PROFESSIONALISM AND ADVANTAGE - At Nuodan, we strive to deliver quality shower heads high pressure products to our customers because we believe in "Transforming your shower experience" and so does our dedicated Customer Happiness team available every day of the week to answer any of your questions.

name: 10 inch Rainfall Shower Head Combo Stainless Steel, THE FIRST WATERFALL mode, 10 Inch Rain Shower Head with Handheld 6 Spray Modes High Pressure, Overhead Shower Adjustable Extension Arm,Chrome
short_description: 【Experience with All Your Senses】Jafeton Experience the ultimate in shower luxury with our high-performance 10" stainless steel rainfall showerhead combo. Immerse yourself in a powerful downpour that will invigorate your senses and transform your shower into a spa-like retreat, just like the scenes in your favorite movies. The whole rain stream will fully encompass your body and can accommodate two adults.

【3 Modes for Shower Head Combo】Introducing Jafeton versatile showerhead with three distinct spray modes: rainfall spray, handheld spray, and rainfall + handheld spray. Immerse yourself in the soothing sensation of a gentle rainfall with 10’’ large square rain shower head, effortlessly switch to the convenience of a handheld spray, or indulge in the combined experience of both. We are the FIRST & ONLY product that has waterfall mode in handheld shower head.

【6 Modes for Handheld Spray】There are various spray modes that create varying water pressure for the ultimate pleasurable experience. Jafeton can not only provide you with a luxurious shower experience but is also suitable for baby showers, pet showers, and cleaning the bathroom. Include shower hose, shower head holder and other accessories to meets your daily needs.

【11’’ Flexible Extension Arm】Jafeton Experience the convenience of our showerhead's dual knobs, allowing you to adjust and achieve the perfect angle and height that suit your preferences. Crafted from solid and durable brass, you can trust its strength and reliability, ensuring no concerns of breakage or leaks. The generous 15-inch vertical movement range makes tightening never so easy.

【2-Year Customer Service & Easy Installation】The Jafeton metal shower head has 2-year Customer Service providing with you peace of mind and assurance in your purchase. No more need to call a plumber! The product is designed with easy installation in mind and comes with clear and user-friendly instructions; you will be able to complete the installation within minutes
If you encounter any issues, please don’t hesitate to reach out to us via Amazon. Jafeton are here to assist you

name: Veken 11.8" Rain Shower Head, Rectangular Rainfall Showerhead with 11" Stainless Steel Exension Arm, Height & Angle Decor Adjustable, Anti-Clog Nozzles Design, Bathroom Accessories, 2.5GPM Chrome
short_description: Extra-Wide Shower Coverage: Step under a generous 11.8-inch rectangular shower head that envelops your entire body in a steady, luxurious flow. Say goodbye to cold spots—this shower is built for full-body comfort.
Soothing Rain-Like Waterfall: Designed to simulate the calm of a natural downpour, the wide spray pattern delivers a relaxing, spa-inspired shower experience that washes away stress with every drop.

Height & Angle Adjustable Arm: Customize your shower height and tilt with our durable extension arm. Built with reinforced stainless steel joints and a swivel ball connector, it stays firmly in place once adjusted.

Anti-Clog Nozzles Design: Engineered with flexible silicone jets that resist mineral buildup, this shower head maintains consistent pressure and performance over time—no scrubbing or pin-pricking required.

Quick & Easy Installation: Transform your bathroom setup in just minutes without calling a plumber. The tool-free installation fits any standard shower arm, making it the perfect upgrade for modern bathrooms.

name: 12'' Rain Shower Head Combo, High Pressure Rainfall Shower Head with 16'' Flexible Adjustment of Height/Angle Upgraded Extension Arm and 5 Setting Spray Handheld Shower Head, Anti-leak (Chrome)
short_description: 12 Inch Shower Head Combo : The 12 " Rain Shower Head is a high performance and excellent combination. The combination of the rain showerhead and hand-held showerhead creates a truly indulgent shower experience, providing a satisfying and enjoyable bathing experience every time.

16 Inch Upgraded Shower Extension Arm : Newly upgraded 16 "extension arm avoids the hassle of getting too close to the wall in the shower. The tight link and setting screws greatly improve the load-bearing capacity of the extension arm. The dual adjustment offers a variety of Angle options, up to 15.47 inches up or down, providing a great vertical shower while catering to a family's height requirements.

12 Inch Large Rain Shower Head : 12 inch rain shower head provides ample coverage, enveloping you in a soothing rainfall-like cascade. Combined ultra-thin design with air-in technology, the large shower head has 144 splash jets that deliver a rain spray. The high-pressure feature ensures a rejuvenating and invigorating shower, leaving you feeling refreshed and energized.

5 Spray Setting Handheld Shower Head : The hand held shower head has 5 spray setting, it offers the flexibility to target specific areas or to rinse off with ease.The water in each mode is fine dense and uniform, making your skin feel gentle and comfortable

Meet Standard and Easy Installation : This shower arm extension has G1/2 standard connection and meets standard rain shower head and handheld shower head. Installation of the system was surprisingly straightforward. The instructions provided were clear and easy to follow, and all the necessary hardware was included.

name: Moen Chrome Bathroom 8-Inch Wide Fixed Rainfall Showerhead, 6345
short_description: RAINSHOWER: Generously sized 8-inch diameter single-function showerhead

VERSATILE DESIGN: Chrome finish is highly reflective for a mirror-like look that works with any decorating style
CONNECTION TYPE: 1/2" IPS

BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty

Bring elegance to your home with premium selections from Moen. From the sophistication of period traditional to the streamlined refinement of minimalist contemporary, you'll find a host of amazing ways to express your style with products from Moen.

name: BESy 12 Inch Rain Shower Head, 12" Square Rainfall & High Pressure Stainless Steel Bath Showerhead, 1/16" Ultra Thin, Waterfall Full Body Coverage with Silicone Nozzle, Matte Black Finish
short_description: EASY INSTALLS - Fits all standard G1/2" pipe threads. Easy installation in wall-mounted or ceiling-mounted shower arms without any tools in several minutes.【 INCLUDED WATER FLOW REGULATOR & 5 REPLACMENT NOZZLES & TEFLON TAPE】

ULTRA THIN & HIGHPRESSURE WATER FLOW – 0.08 inch thick and air-in technology, which make the Square Shower Head is strong and high pressure，optimized for any water pressure, Super large with 12 by 12 inch,full cover the body, just like full and dynamic massage to your skin.

LEAK PROOF AND RUST RESISTANCE – The Shower rainhead is made of high quality solid stainless steel with Matte Black Finish, ensuring durability and dependability, makes the item rustproof and corrosion from daily use. To prevent leaking, we use the best soft rubber gasket and teflon tape.

SELF-CLEANING SOFT SILICONE NOZZLES – The self-cleaning design of 256 silicone nozzles keeps health and save your time. Food-grade silicone for the nozzles, make sure your safety and health when you enjoy bathing.
ADJUSTABLE - The swivel adapter design allows you to angle the shower head. Great gift idea for men, women, mom, home and family, Good choice for Christmas Day and New Year gift.

name: High Pressure Rainfall Shower Head, 6 Inches Luxury Modern Showerhead with Perfect Adjustable Replacement, Removable Restrictor, Easy Installation for Your Bathroom Shower Heads (Matte Black)
short_description: HIGH PRESSURE RAINFALL SHOWER HEAD: Our 6 inches luxury bathroom high pressure shower heads produce rainfall water streams that relieve your body stress and rejuvenate the senses. In addition, our rainfall showerhead offers 1.8GPM removable water restrictor, so you can save on your water bill and enjoy a longer natural SPA at home.

ADVANCED DESIGN: Our elegant matte black shower head with high quality ABS plastic and matte black plated layer, more durable, rust-proof and beautiful. 360° adjustable metal ball connection joint design makes our shower head flexible to adjust angles or directions for a more comfortable shower.

EASY TO CLEAN NOZZLES: Our high pressure showerhead comes with 90 anti-clogging silicone nozzles, offering consistent reliability to easily remove hard water deposits such as limescale. The anti-clogging silicone nozzles can push out water flow faster and ensure you always feel the full force of this luxurious rain shower head.

EASY INSTALLATION: You can install fixed shower head with G1/2 inch connection thread manually and it can work in minutes, without plumbers or tools. Also Included: Extra Teflon Tape (plumbers tape) and Water Filter to help with fitting the moment it arrives.

BRAND ADVANTAGE: AISINYI support team is available to help with any product questions or needs. Your happiness and satisfaction are our top priority - if you're not satisfying or ever need any help, please feel free to message us on Amazon. We pride ourselves on providing only the best in high-quality products.

name: Hibbent All Metal Shower Head, 10'' High Pressure Rainfall Shower Head/Handheld Showerhead Combo with 12'' Adjustable Curve Shower Extension Arm, 10 Sprays, 71'' Shower Hose, Showerhead Holder, Chrome
short_description: Excellent Shower Head Combo: This hand shower combination includes a 10-inch large square rainfall shower head, a chrome-faced handheld shower head with 10 spray settings, a 71-inch metal stainless steel shower hose, a 12-inch shower head extension arm, an adhesive shower head holder, washers, Teflon tape, and an installation manual. The all-metal, solid brass stainless steel extra-long 71-inch shower hose is made of odorless EPDM material and can be used in high-temperature environments

Rainfall 10'' Shower Head: The large rainfall shower head body is made of certified SUS 304 stainless steel to ensure rust resistance, durability, and a long service life. With its combined ultra-thin design and air-in technology, the large shower head has 110 splash jets that deliver a rain spray. The brass swivel ball connector adjusts the shower head to any angle you desire, allowing you to enjoy a relaxing hotel-style bathing experience

High Pressure 10 Settings Handheld Shower Head: The shower head features rub-clean spray nozzles for easy cleaning. The chrome shower head offers a customized showering experience, allowing you to choose from 10 powerful high-pressure settings to best suit your needs, including a wide fan mode for efficiently cleaning large areas. The water flow regulator optimizes water pressure for daily conservation. It's great for cleaning the bathtub, washing hair in the bathroom, pet showers, or baby baths

Upgraded Adjustable 12'' Shower Extension Arm: The integrated shower head extension arm ensures a watertight seal, preventing leaks for safe usage. Its elegantly upgraded height and angle-adjustable design allow you to smoothly raise or lower the rain shower head while keeping it perfectly horizontal. This innovative design prevents collisions with the extension arm, unlike ordinary extenders that hit the showerhead and cause water to flow at an awkward angle. The Hibbent curved shape design enhances its bearing capacity, elevating your shower head and enabling vertical water flow

Upgraded 3-Way Diverter Valve & Easy Installation: This shower head combo installs easily without tools or a plumber. Its versatile 3-way diverter allows individual use of the handheld shower, rainfall shower head, or both simultaneously. Unlike ordinary 3-way diverter valves, which are separated from the extension arms, requiring additional connections prone to leaks and wobbling, our Hibbent extension arm features an integrated connection design without leaks and wobbling

name: Hibbent All Metal Rain Shower Head, 10'' High Pressure Rainfall Square Showerhead with 16" Shower Head Extension Arm, Solid Brass Adjustable Shower Arm Extender, Waterfall fixed Showerheads, Chrome
short_description: 【High-pressure Shower Head】This all-metal, stainless steel rainfall shower head has a powerful water pressure. Its ultra-thin design, combined with air-in technology, adds a modern and sleek touch to your bathroom decor. This shower head equipped with 110 splash jets provides a luxurious rain spray that envelops your body with full drops, providing a dynamic high-pressure massage experience even at low water pressure levels.

【16'' Adjustable Shower Extension Arm】The 16'' arc-shaped shower head extension arm, with adjustable height and angle, not only adds a touch of elegance to your bathroom but also enhances its load-bearing capacity. This innovative design ensures that the shower head remains vertical and at the perfect height without hitting the shower arm. You can easily adjust the extension arm to achieve the perfect shower position, providing a comfortable and enjoyable bathing experience.

【Upgraded Rainfall Shower Head】The upgraded 10x9'' shower head delivers higher water pressure and is lighter in weight, thereby providing better support for the shower arm extension; while maintaining the same refreshing showering experience. The brass swivel ball connector adjusts the shower head to any angle you desire, allowing you to enjoy a relaxing hotel-style bathing experience.

【Self-cleaning Silicone Nozzles】The rain shower head is equipped with 110 soft silicone nozzle sprays, specifically designed to prevent limescale buildup and clogging. These high-quality silicone nozzles not only ensure a safe and healthy bath experience but also make cleaning a breeze. Simply wipe away any residue or buildup, and the self-cleaning properties of the silicone material will keep the nozzles in pristine condition, ensuring an enjoyable shower every time.

【Secure Lock Joints】Our shower head arm extension is made of solid brass and stainless steel and is equipped with two lock joints. These locking joints are specifically designed to match perfectly with our shower head's unique locking function, ensuring a secure and reliable connection. Easy-to-tighten joints provide added stability, allowing the extension arm to support even heavier rainfall shower heads without worrying about sagging or loosening.

name: Veken Wide Rain Shower Head with 6 Modes Handheld Water Spray,High Pressure Showerhead Combo with Arm for Bathroom Accessories,Home Decor Detachable Dual Shower with Anti-Clog Nozzles,Silver Chrome
short_description: Luxury Rain Shower Experience: Transform your daily shower into a spa-like escape with the 11.8-inch rainfall shower head, delivering full-body coverage and consistent water pressure.
6-Mode Handheld Spray: Enjoy versatile shower options — choose from mist, massage, or rain settings — perfect for rinsing hair, bathing pets, or cleaning the tub.

Adjustable Extension Arm: Customize your shower height and angle effortlessly — ideal for both tall and short users, making every shower tailored to your comfort. Tilt and turn with ease to find the perfect angle for your next shower.
Easy Tool-Free Installation: No plumber needed! Install your new shower head combo in minutes with the simple, tool-free setup — perfect for home upgrades or rentals.
Durable & Anti-Leak Design: Built with high-quality chrome and anti-leak technology to prevent dripping and extend the shower head's lifespan — enjoy long-lasting luxury.
